thread.title: Crete authorities searching for missing French tourist
thread.title_full: Crete authorities searching for missing French tourist

author: eTN Global Editor
title: Crete authorities searching for missing French tourist
text:
Crete authorities searching for missing French tourist   10, 2015 eTN   
HERAKLION, Crete - Authorities on Crete launched a search operating for a missing French tourist on Saturday. 
The 75-year-old man, who was not named, is said to have arrived on his own on the island on October 2. 
He booked a room at a hotel in Makrys Gialos. 
On the day after his arrival, he rented a car and set off on a tour of the island but was not seen again. 
Hotel staff began to search for him on Friday as he was due to check out. 
They entered his room and found that all his belongings were still there. 
At that point, they notified the police.
